footer.text: All rights reserved. All wrongs reserved.

hero.title: Got lost in the vastness of the internet?
hero.text: Welcome here stranger! I'm a soon-to-be software engineer who loves to build things for the web. I'm currently working on some cool projects and learning new technologies. I'm also open to new opportunities, so feel free to contact me if you want to work together.
hero.illustrationAlt: Illustration of a tourist with a map

game.title: Bored already? Play this little game I made for you
game.text: Or don't, it's up to you. I'm not your boss. Kidding, I'm your boss now. Play the game. But, wait, it seems like the game is not working. I guess you have to check out my projects instead.
game.button: Pleeeaaaseee look at my projects ðŸ¥º

hero.title: Contact me
hero.text: Want to get in touch? There are a few ways you can reach out to me. The easiest is to send me an email at

form.title: Or use the form below
form.text: You can just send a message and leave both your name and email empty, if you want to remain anonymous.
form.name: Name
form.messagePlaceholder: I am fluent in over six million forms of communication, a feat I doubt you can match.
form.error: An error occurred. Please try again later.

donate.title: Help me getting started
donate.text1: Currently studying Computer Science at university, I am looking for a way to get started with real projects and am looking for potential clients.
donate.text2: In case you want to support me but don't know how, consider donating a small amount of money. It would help me a lot!
donate.paypal: You can send the money directly to my PayPal if you prefer. Just use
donate.unsuccessful: Your payment was not successful, please try again.
donate.stripeError: An error occurred while displaying the payment form. Please try again later or use the PayPal link.

paymentSuccess.title: Payment succeeded!
paymentSuccess.text: Thank you for your donation! Your support means a lot to me.

error.title: Something went wrong!
error.text: Don't worry though, we've been notified and will fix it as soon as possible. In the meantime, you can try to refresh the page or come back later.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.text: Here are some of the projects I've worked on. I hope you like them! If you want to see more, you can check out my GitHub profile or the organizations I'm part of.

list.name: Spark
list.description: A chat application that allows users to communicate in real-time. The app was heavily inspired by Discord and features a similar design. I started building it once I learned how to create and use databases, and further developed it as I learned more about web development. This project is my most complex one yet and I'm very proud of it, although it's still a work in progress and needs some improvements.

list.name: Portfolio
list.description: My personal portfolio website. I built it to showcase my projects and skills, and I plan to keep improving it as I learn new things, like adding a blog section and making it more interactive.

list.name: Alpaca
list.description: Alpaca is a learning app that helps users memorize things more effectively. As opposed to other alternatives, it uses a range of different techniques to help memorization, letting users choose the one that works best for them. This app is the one that made me and my friends choose to create our own cooperative, LLAMA! More on that in the About section.

list.name: Llemur
list.description: Llemur is a company system management app that helps small businesses manage their employees, locations and deadlines. Llemur is also a part of the cooperative project I mentioned earlier, and it's the first project we made for a client. It's still in development and we plan to add more features in the future.

list.name: Floppy Bot
list.description: A Discord bot that I created for my personal server. It features a variety of commands, including a music player, a moderation system, and more. It is in hanging development and I plan to add more features in the future as I need them.
list.imageAlt: Screenshot of Floppy Bot in action

list.name: Snake
list.description: A simple Snake game that I made as a university project. It was my first project using Java, and I plan to improve it in the future, adding more features and making the AI smarter.

about.title: All of that is great, but who are you?
about.text: I'm a student at a university in Paris doing a degree in computer science. I'm passionate about web and software development and I'm always looking for new things to learn. For now, this place is just a way for me to showcase my projects and expose ways to contact me. In the future, I plan to add a blog and maybe some other features to make this place more interesting.
